targets.expr: max(jvm{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (runtime, vendor, version) or max(jvm_info{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (runtime, vendor, version)

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="nonheap"}) by (pod) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="nonheap", id!="Compressed Class Space"}) by (pod))
avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (id)
avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", area="nonheap"}) by (id)

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (status)
histogram_quantile($percentile, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, outcome))

sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (status)
histogram_quantile($percentile, sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_bucket{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, outcome))
avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", id="$heap_id"})
avg(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", id="$heap_id"})
avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", id="$nonheap_id"})
avg(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", id="$nonheap_id"})
avg(irate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (gc, action, cause)
avg(irate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (gc, action, cause)
